Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can give clear instruction, while teachers may give students ambiguous instructions. GenAI would provide more helpful extra information and you can keep asking relevant questions to minimize the gap of knowledge.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI would give you not creative and inspiring feedback, but teachers could provide the feedback aligning with the rubrics.
